entity.name: Lunch

text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes That isn’t true at all, Don. You held rallies until 5 weeks ago. Your own staff says you watch tv all morning and only go into the Oval Office after lunch. You go to press briefings but not coronavirus committee meetings. You are lying again. BTW, tweeting isn’t work.
